job_stories.title: Update Personal Information
job_stories.situation: I need to update my personal details (name, email, bio)
job_stories.motivation: edit my profile information in a clear, intuitive form
job_stories.outcome: my account reflects my current information and I can be properly identified

acceptance_criteria.given: the user is logged in and on any page
acceptance_criteria.when: they click the profile icon in the navigation
acceptance_criteria.then: they are navigated to the profile settings page

acceptance_criteria.given: the user is on the profile settings page
acceptance_criteria.when: they modify the email field with an invalid format
acceptance_criteria.then: an inline error message appears immediately showing 'Please enter a valid email address'

acceptance_criteria.given: the user has made valid changes to their profile
acceptance_criteria.then: a success toast appears and the changes are persisted to the database

acceptance_criteria.given: the user changes their email address and saves
acceptance_criteria.then: a confirmation email is sent to the new email address

job_stories.title: Upload Profile Picture
job_stories.situation: I want to personalize my account
job_stories.motivation: upload a profile picture that represents me
job_stories.outcome: other users can recognize me and my profile feels more personal

acceptance_criteria.given: the user is on the profile settings page
acceptance_criteria.when: they click on the avatar placeholder

acceptance_criteria.given: the user selects an image larger than 5MB
acceptance_criteria.then: an error message shows 'File must be under 5MB'

acceptance_criteria.given: the user selects a valid image file
acceptance_criteria.when: they confirm the crop and upload
acceptance_criteria.then: a progress indicator is shown during upload and the new avatar appears after success

job_stories.title: Manage Privacy Settings
job_stories.situation: I'm concerned about my information being visible to others
job_stories.motivation: control which profile fields are public vs. private
job_stories.outcome: I can share information on my terms and maintain my privacy

acceptance_criteria.given: the user navigates to the Privacy Settings tab
acceptance_criteria.then: each profile field has a privacy toggle (public/private) visible

acceptance_criteria.given: the user toggles a field from public to private
acceptance_criteria.then: the change is saved immediately and the UI reflects the new state

acceptance_criteria.given: a field is marked as private
acceptance_criteria.when: another user views this user's profile
acceptance_criteria.then: that field is not displayed to them

job_stories.title: Delete Account
job_stories.situation: I no longer want to use the platform
job_stories.motivation: permanently delete my account and associated data
job_stories.outcome: I can exercise my right to be forgotten and ensure data privacy

acceptance_criteria.given: the user is on the profile settings page
acceptance_criteria.then: a confirmation modal appears explaining the consequences

acceptance_criteria.given: the user is in the deletion confirmation modal
acceptance_criteria.when: they enter their password and click 'Confirm Deletion'
acceptance_criteria.then: their account is scheduled for deletion with a 30-day grace period

acceptance_criteria.given: an account is scheduled for deletion
acceptance_criteria.when: the user logs in within 30 days
acceptance_criteria.then: they see an option to cancel the deletion and restore their account
